name: Could You Be An Editor? Online Trivia | Quiz Creation Guidelines | 15 Questions

questions.text:
Who was not an origanal member?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Spelling.

	Who was not an original member?

questions.text:
Whitch pokémon has blades for hands?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Spelling and capitalization.

	Which Pokémon has blades for hands?

questions.text:
What colour is ashs hat?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Capitalization and apostrophes.

	What color is Ash's hat? FunTrivia editors expect quiz writers to be consistent in their spelling; an American Editor will not expect a UK writer to use US spellings and vice versa.

questions.text:
There is no concept of orthodoxy in Hinduism.

What errors does this sentence contain?

What cereal looks like cheerios except has color? 

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Grammar and capitalization.

	Which cereal looks like Cheerios except that it has color? Remember, both US and UK spelling are OK for FunTrivia, so "color" *is* an acceptable spelling.

questions.text:
The rock-opera musical 'Hair' may seem an unusual place to find Shakespeare, but near the end of the second act, two cast members recite a passage from the Bard.

What errors does this sentence contain?

Who's party was it?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Apostrophes and spelling.

	Whose party was it?

questions.text:
What is the teens hangout?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Apostrophes.

	What is the teens' hangout? (if teens is meant to be plural) or What is the teen's hangout (if teens is singular)

questions.text:
How many lines are in a Shakespearean sonnet?

What errors does this sentence contain?

Which of the followin is NOT one of the seven dwarfs?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Spelling and capitalization.

	Which of the following is not one of the Seven Dwarfs?

questions.text:
In wrestlemania X, who did Randy Savage defeat in a falls count anywhere match?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Capitalization, grammar and punctuation.

	In Wrestlemania X, whom did Randy Savage defeat in a 'Falls Count Anywhere' match?

questions.text:
What did Nicole do to Carmen at her Birthday Party?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Capitalization and grammar.

	What did Nicole do to Carmen at her birthday party? It is unclear, however, whom 'her' refers to, so the grammar is also incorrect.

questions.text:
What Democratic primary candidate in 1992 never endorsed Bill Clinton?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Grammar and punctuation.

	Which Democratic primary candidate, in 1992, never endorsed Bill Clinton?

questions.text:
DO your homework in the dark and eat your cereal in the dark is a quote from what christian slater movie?

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Capitalization and punctuation.

	'Do your homework in the dark and eat your cereal in the dark' is a quote from what Christian Slater movie? Someone has pointed out to me that the quote as written by the quiz author is also incorrect!

questions.text:
If you know blues clues then heres a quiz for you!

What errors does this sentence contain?
questions.explanation:
Capitalization, punctuation and apostrophes.

	If you know 'Blue's Clues', then here's a quiz for you!
